t: Amazon.com: The Best Of R.E.M. At The BBC[2 LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Love this REM live album. They really show their love for what they do- Make Music ... Really enjoyed these versions. ... While the BEST OF THE BBC set is a vital set of live performances captured on Vinyl, the vinyl set is grossly inadequate compared to the 8 CD Box set and this is a shame really.
